pr_title: Fix error reporting for SSL resources outside of config dir

timeline.message: Fix error reporting for SSL resources outside of config dir

Revert "Fix error reporting for SSL resources outside of config dir"

This reverts commit d40c2b66dfbf367896182c1db79a5e0953a1e6ea.
moving creation of ssl service before ssl resource watcher
ensure ssl configuration files are readable
Report exceptions rather than throw them

timeline.author: ywangd

timeline.bodyText: I don't think it's really necessary, but corresponding error messages during SSL Context building are finer grained, e.g. different error messages are logged for different subtypes of IOException, security permission failure is explicitly called out.
timeline.author: ywangd

replies.bodyText:
Yes, and those messages will still be printed.
The net effect of this PR is to catch+log the exception and then get out the way so that the more fine grained error handling can do its job.
replies.author: tvernum

timeline.bodyText: Nit: isn't this redundant since the above constructor would have failed already if the object does not get created?
timeline.author: ywangd

timeline.bodyText: I think these are no longer needed given the new change of reporting error instead of throwing.
timeline.author: ywangd

timeline.bodyText: Based on the exceptions that get caught in startWatching, do we need another method for testing IOException? I suggest we modify this method to be more generic to cover both scenarios and randomize the exception.
timeline.author: ywangd
